traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The abomination can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Natural Camouflage
traits.desc: The abomination has advantage on stealth checks in aquatic environments.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abomination makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw against being paralyzed. On a failed save, the creature’s body begins to go numb and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is paralyzed for 1 hour.

actions.name: Putrid Water Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The abomination unleashes a spray of foul water in a 30-foot line. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) necrotic damage and 16 (3d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The abomination can track any creature affected by this ability up to 5 miles away for the next 24 hours.
